name: Elysium Heights
description:
Elysium Heights is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel where you play as Catherine, a small town girl that recently moved in to New York.

One morning on her day off, she receives a call from her boss with an unexpected offer to work that night at a fancy event in one of the most luxurious buildings in the city: Elysium Heights.
The outcome of that night will change Catherine’s life forever...

In this game you’ll have to make decisions that will cause unique and distinct interactions between all characters.

Sex, money, lust, romance, cheating, corruption... What will she find?

The choice is yours.
